author: Bobins Abraham
title: KK Shailaja - Health Minister & Former Science Teacher Leading Kerala's Fight Against COVID-19
description: The state which was the first to report COVID-19 in India, back in January. And in a matter of days, the state swung into action on a war footing level, anticipating the explosion of cases that were to follow. The COVID-19 response of Kerala was spearheaded b…
content:
The COVID-19 outbreak is an unprecedented disaster and leaders around the world are still learning how to deal with the crisis that is evolving every day. The situation in India is no different.
